revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=BeagleBone |revision=Black (A5A) Rev B |asin=B00CHYOLHK |price=50 |manuf_country=China, USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=SeeedStudio <!-- CircuitCo --> |manuf_model=LGX BB100 |availability= |est_release_date=01/2013 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=Sitara AM3359;XAM3359AZCZ100; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=2 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC2GMTEA-0F-WT |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16HA-125 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=LAN8710A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=32K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32AT-I/OT;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver with 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVC2G241DCU;;1;,,, Single Positive-edge-triggered D-type Flip-flop;TI;SN74LVC1G74DCT;;1;,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G06DCK;;1;,,, 4 Channel ESD Solution for USB;Texas Instruments;TPD4S012DRY;;2;,,, 500ma Low Noise Voltage Regulator;Texas Instruments;TL5209D;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2051BDGN;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217C;;1; |flags=HDMI, MicroSD Card slot, GPIO, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.04;-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;3.8.11;Angstrom v2012.12; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Arch Linux (Arm), Debian, |default_ip=192.168.7.2 |default_user=root |oui_eth=C8:A0:30 }} {{TagLine|BeagleBone Black Board}} :[http://beagleboard.org/black Product page]
*OEM: [[SeeedStudio]] (LGX BB100) and Rev B (US - 4GB eMMC): :''CircuitCo'' (Made in USA, Not Element14/Embest from China)
{{See also|BeagleBoard Devices|List of SBCs}}
The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/1A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B 5V/1A *Expansion connectors: Micro HDMI output
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[TI]] AM3359 AZCZ100 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :512 MB RAM (DDR3L), 2/4 GB eMMC (Debian Linux) :USB Host, 1x 10/100 Eth port, micro HDMI, micro SD :5V DC input, includes 3-ft USB Type-A device cable
===Lnks=== *[http://linuxgizmos.com/beaglebone-black-gains-15-dollar-metal-enclosure/ ''BeagleBone Black $15 metal enclosure ships'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===See also=== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
